scripts.sync:www: mkdir -p cordova/www && rm -rf cordova/www/* && cp -r angular/dist/angular/browser/* cordova/www/
scripts.cordova:build:android: npm run ng:build && npm run sync:www && cd cordova && cordova build android
scripts.cordova:run:android: npm run ng:build && npm run sync:www && cd cordova && cordova run android
scripts.ota:release: npm run ota:bump && npm run ota:bundle
